name: Music_3342.wav
caption: This song features an electric guitar played using a clean tone. Octaves are played in this clip. The first note is a slide up two frets followed by an ascending lick using octaves throughout the song. There are no other instruments in this song. A buzz is heard probably from the hi-gain amp that is being used. There is no voice in this song. This song can be used in a guitar instruction video.
